p: Rosin-based cyclic tricarbonate is a brown solid. It can be prepared from maleopimaric acid triglycidyl ester and carbon dioxide according to Scheme 34, prior to washing and vacuum drying [ 132]. Its applications include synthesis of quaternary ammonium salt derivatives [ 132] and non-isocyanate polyurethanes [ 200]. Rosin-based carbamate group-containing quaternary ammonium salt derivatives are brown solids. They can be prepared from rosin-based cyclic tricarbonate, N,N-dimethylaminopropylamine and alkyl bromides according to Scheme 34, and using vacuum drying and recrystallization [ 132]. They exhibit strong antimicrobial properties [ 132].
